# documentContextBeforeInput

**Instance Property**

Textual context before the insertion point in the current text input object.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var documentContextBeforeInput: String? { get }
```

## Obtaining textual context around the insertion point

- **documentContextAfterInput**: Textual context after the insertion point in the current text input object.
